content.detailedDescription: I was jogging at approximately 9:03 p.M. (+/-2 minutes) as i saw a flying object. the object was oval like an egg, but a bit more rounded on his lateral extremes. it had two windows, from which lights were seen. the windows were located at the front, under the middle radius of the object. the form of them were very characteristically, at the sides of the windows towards the middle the 2 sides were angled, and the side towards the outline was one round. it was dark by that time. i noticed the object, because i was in the right field of view, when it flied from north to south at the horizon in a straight line. it was at least four times faster than a domestic airplane. i was shocked when i saw it, because i interpreted it at the first glance like a ufo, because it is well-known that no airplane can flight at such an accelerated speed. i stopped running when i saw it. the crucial point of my observation, what made me sure to have seen a ufo, is the following: after 1 and a half second it vanished, while it flew. i believe the object accelerated that much that it was impossible to follow it with eyes, because his direction was vienna. i stared at the point i saw it for 2 minutes, because i was so impressed of my experience. i was astonished, because i had a personal proof that ufos are a real phenomenon.
content.summary: Oval ufo flies rapidly from north to south in straight line to vienna and disappears after 1 and 1/2 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was cycling home from work in the late afternoon. the sun was already down but it was not completely dark yet. i was riding along a country lane at a speed of 20 km a hour to the east. i do't know what made me notice it, suddenly it was there at my right side. it was a glowing electric blue orb, it admitted no sound and it went overhead with a enormous speed and it dissapeard behind a tree. it must have came from behind me from a great altitude (there were clouds in the sky and there was some normal air traffic in the form of passenger planes) and it desended very fast to earth in a straight line until it dissapeard behind the tree. i never have seen anything go so fast except meteors. at first, i thought it was a meteor becouse i've seen a blue meteor crashing in a field a couple of years before, but i realized it didnot had a tale of light. the tree were the orb had dissapeared behind was about 20 meters in front of me. i went as fast as i could to see if i could find it behind there, but nothing was to be seen. at this point i hoped to see it again, and it left me a bit puzzled about what it was. i decided it was not a normal sighting of a meteor(no tail) or a human aircraft (to slow). and somthing about that intense blue light made me think it could have been a ufo.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Blue orb in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My
 name is dr vivek sharma.I am a cardiologist by profession
 practicing a semiurban cardiac hospital at allahabad city of
 uttar pradesh state in india.

 this
 event happened in the year around 2003. u must have heard
 about an uproar about face scratcher or muh-nochwa in hindi
 language in rural areas of uttar pradesh state india around
 2002-2003 in summer months.
 it was summer days in 2003 ...I was
 at home on my vacation .....My home is on the banks of river
 ganga  at jhunsi area near sangam ( very famous pilgrimage
 place for hindus)

 that time there was rumor going on
 about some mysterious thing called muh-nochwa......Who moves
 in sky like a bright round white light .... simmilar to
 star.....And it has starnge movement which people
 noticed....That it follows people, hide behind trees ,
 buildings, comes in dark ,  in night, and occasionally some
 got bitten by strange lights .....Victims who came near to
 this describe in different ways .....Some said it was
 combination of bright shinning blue green white
 lights...Which can't stared due to brightness.....Some
 say it's bright white light .....But one thing was
 common no body has seen anything except lights.....Some had
 bite marks, scratch marks on face,body,burn marks etc, not
 very grevious injury.....Even animals get bitten by this,
 anyone moving alone or at secluded place becomes the
 target,.....Lots and lots of activity going on those days
 ...Media making news, govt agencies trying to hide things,
 putting some in to jail even, police was on continous
 vigilence....Emergency number s displayed.....Every evening
 there is huge public noise....People chasing
 something,.....Police jeep's following something....Even
  gun fired on some....Some  district magistrate have made
 videos of moving lights in sky.... immediately suspended by
 government.....U can read on internet about such phenomenon
 in detail......

 that time people kept higher
 vigilance at homes .....Kept bucket of water on roofs and
 bamboo rods ....Rumour was that it uses  high voltage
 electricity and robot like hands.....So water keeps them
 away and bamboo used to fight with some ......Some even
 fought with such lights in remote rural
 areas.....
 researchers
 from nasa and i i t kanpur also visited..But  concluded it
 as hoax

i wish to share in details
content.summary: Sudden daylight like glow at midnight just infront of my home

content.detailedDescription: The security camera recorded a wide flash of light above a tree top at 1:44am.  the light then flashed a narrow pen-light beam to the vertical window shade. the shadow of the light is reflected on the window.  there were no helicopter sounds that i remember.  the sound was muted in the cctv recording.
content.summary: Bright flash of light above flowering tree. the direction of the light is from the sky above the tree in the security video.

content.detailedDescription: My co worker recently installed a surveillance camera on her front porch to make sure no one steals delivered holiday packages. aforementioned surveillance camera is called yi homecamera and is activated by motion and then sends a short video of any captured movement. generally it catches either cars driving back and forth down her street or cats it shoots color during the day and vlack and whaute at night but on 12/2/17 at about 5 am the camera sent 3 videos to her. 2 of them we just of her porch so brightly lit that you could see nothing but light and she thought maybe it was someone turning around un her drive way with their brights on although it did seem much too unusually bright for that but she thought nothing of it and deleted the first two untill she watched the 3rd video of the ufo and immediately sent it to me and told me about it at work. so i asked her permission and she said it would be alright for me to share it.
content.summary: A bright flash was captured on camera but not kept the a short video of ufo was kept

content.detailedDescription: It was a saturday morning and i had just got done watching cartoons when i went outside.I don't remember what i went outside for but i went to my front yard.I looked up in the sky by the pine trees when i saw this metallic disk like thing.It was kinda like a pie pan but more disk like.I was not scared but interested in the object.I was froze with not fear but rather excitement.The object just seemed to hover around the trees as it was interested in the trees.I lost sight of it when it went behind the trees and i never saw it again.
content.summary: Interesting and exiting!

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/16/17 at approx. 2100 hr (9:00pm) i called in my dogs from our backyard, i couldn't help but notice, something glowing extremely bright, high in the night sky, far above lit homes, as seen from my backyard. i wanted to think it might be a brightly lit plane or hovering helicopter, as it seemed to be hovering, then moving forward. however, it always remained glowing. when i opened the backyard glass door, it was impossible to to look up, whatever the object was, it was way to bright to be any aircraft, i've ever seen. it moved in my direction but never past my house, i called my wife to have a look, she commented,'' your friends are back,'' (jokingly) as these sightings, are concurrent. 

i couldn't look out the backyard door, and not be forced to look up, it was a beautiful glowing object, when i first saw it, it was hovering, then flowed forward, effortlessly, almost like it shouldn't have moved so gracefully. i wanted to know more about it and watch it but i was in a tee-shirt & it was almost freezing outside. i honestly didn't want to take my eyes off of it but my wife was hurrying me as we were going to do some late night grocery shopping. 

i only had my cell phone on me this time so that is what i used to take a digital photo of the glowing object, it is a samsung galaxy amp 2, with a 5 mp forward facing camera. 

the object was definitely moving forwards but didn't really appear to be going anywhere, hard to put into words.

in the single photo i took of the glowing object, you can see the lit houses below the object, as well as stars in different areas of the photo, though much smaller in appearance then the glowing object.
content.summary: Extremely bright glowing object above lit homes

content.detailedDescription: 3 white lights (looked like fire) appeared suddenly. they were larger and brighter than stars, in a perfect line, in the middle of the afternoon. sky was clear. hovered and then slowly faded away.
content.summary: 3 white lights (looked like fire) larger than stars in a perfect line. hovered and then slowly faded away.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 5am i look out the window there was a fire down the block i look up and i see a object with bright colors moving up and down for 2 hours
content.summary: There was a fire going on i look out it was just moving up and down getting bright

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo craft i reported is back out there now.
i saw it at 5:20 i saw a very very fast light move from the top of the sky
to the east sky. this one was so different than the one that is out there now!

   it was a large white light. it lasted a slit second!
content.summary: A fast one!

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the same craft back at 11:00 pm. 
at 11:35 i saw two of them. one was closer in the se sky near the
pleides. it was clear. they were then at a 45 degree angle again.
at 12:16 am it was still there.

i got real cold, went inside and fell asleep at 4:32 am sunday, i did look out, it was cloudy and i went to sleep.
content.summary: It camed back!

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside of house and seen what i thought was a flock of birds flying at night but it turned out to be a dark type plane with no lights or noise flying by between the clouds. it was very unusual as the area here in oakland, ca has planes or helicopters and this was something very scary i have never seen. it kind of looks like a stealth plane.
content.summary: Looks like a stealth type plane

content.detailedDescription:
This wasn't really a ufo but it was weird. in 2014, i was 16 at the time, average night. i went to bed early with my dog because i had a test the next morning. i woke up suddenly around 1-something in the morning no idea what woke me up. then i started to have a piercing headache i sat up and rubbed my eyes and looked around and i noticed a small trail of what i can only describe as a small wisp of fog and or mist or smoke, flying around my room at a fast, steady speed. i thought it was my imagination because it was so tiny but when it flew right by my face, it looked so real i grabbed my phone and quickly started taking flash pictures all around my room trying to catch it in one, all the while just thinking "i've gotta get this, i've gotta get this", and my head hurt more and more.

 then i don't really remember what happened next i must have fallen asleep or something because i woke up from a nightmare the next morning (don't remember what it was about now). i was in an awkward position on my bed and my phone was on the floor face down a few feet from my bed (thankfully not broken). remembering last night, i quickly jumped up, picked it up and looked through the pictures i took carefully scanning each one slowly... and then i saw it. i actually caught the thing in a picture (even though it was a bad phone camera at the time and a little blurred). top of the picture is the small wisp of smoke flying beside my curtain, it zipped around so fast i'm actually surprised i got it. you can also see my dog sleeping soundly in the bottom of the photo. since that night i've seen lots of weird things and i found out a few weeks after i don't dream anymore, all i get is the occasional nightmares or i'm just in a dead sleep... i told my parents about what happened the day it happened and they had no idea. i sent my dad a copy of the photo because said he wanted to show it to some people. recently he brought it up again and so i thought i would put this up somewhere. i was curious whether this has happened to anyone else. or if anyone and seen it in another way, or could debunk it for me.

20 yr.Old me tried to recreate the picture with dust and lights trying to debunk it but i never could figure it out. my window was closed but left unlocked on the second floor. it flew around my room unnaturally fast and i've never seen it again since. but over the next years since then i've seen this ufo in the sky. normally it is the same object and i see it over my house or at my family's cottage in the sky. 

 a black triangle with a white light on each point, flying super fast past (faster then any plane i've seen and i've been to air shows before) or just hovering and disappearing into clouds or all together in a starry night, making me wonder if i even saw it. never got any picture or proof of them though... i either didn't have a phone while on my walk or hike, or i wasn't fast enough. i recently saw one again in november over my house but again i wasn't fast enough to get a picture. i'm a very proof driven person so normally i say 'get a picture or evidence or it's like it didn't happen.' no picture = no proof, and it could just be your mind playing tricks on you..
content.summary: Smoke trailing wisp

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on highland at the intersection of melrose.
noticed some people looking up and pointing at something in the sky.
i stopped to see what everyone was looking at and got to see the phenomenal for about 35 seconds.
it was a bright object that resembled a check mark or depends from which angle you look at it it looked like the letter v.
it had a very unusual flight pattern, it bounced around for about 10 seconds before changing directions and disappearing from sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo shaped like a check mark witnessed

content.detailedDescription: This has probably already been reported in other forms considering we're a community of rural hippies. about 1986 in late fall or winter, i woke up one night because the blankets over my feet were vibrating. earthquakes are fairly common in the area and i thought that was probably the cause but outside was an intensely bright light like a welding arc that cast sharp shadows on the walls and the trees outdoors but it was silent and steady. there was a gravel road beside the house lined w/ some bushes that cast the shadows. the gravel betrayed anyone that walked on it, even deer, but especially a car which might have had its headlights on. the light was too intense for headlights and there was no sound, so i got up and started to go down to see what it was, thinking that it looked like some kind of ufo. as i made it to the stairs, i visualized some course of events; i could check it out and go back to bed w/ my girlfriend and baby daughter, or i could check it out and disappear forever. not a hard choice, but i then felt fearful, the decision seemed to affect it, and the light went out. the next day i checked out the spot on the driveway where it had been, there was no sign that i could see. a few days later my neighbor (betty deutche sp?) said that on that night her back door was rattling (vibrating like the blankets on my bed) like someone was trying to get in. a month or two later i heard that traffic had been roadblocked for awhile on comptche rd around that time(?) by military people w/ green uniforms and rifles, and that a saucer had been seen traveling up one of the higher ridges between orr springs and ukiah. sorry i don't know the person who told me & didn't put the 2 events together till later. mufon might have a record of it though since the craft and the roadblock was seen by several people.
content.summary: Bright soundless orb that cast very sharp shadows from behind bushes

content.detailedDescription: I was staying in a rough summer cabin type houseboat. there was a ladder linking the lower floor with the bedroom upstairs. i was asleep and got up to use the bathroom, descending the ladder. beside the ladder was a large window which faced the willamette slough, and beyond it, sauvie's island. i didn't look out the window on the way down that i recall. when i climbed the ladder to go back to bed, i looked across the water to the island and saw a huge craft hovering over the island. i stopped and watched. it was a classic "flying saucer" shaped craft and around the perimeter of the disc were white lights that appeared to be moving slowly and sequentially from right to left. i watched it, stunned, for maybe 30 seconds. suddenly, it went straight up, in a second's time, and was gone. i never reported it or anything. i knew people would think i was crazy. i have told many people though, over the years. it remains a very clear picture in my mind. it was awhile before i got back to sleep.
content.summary: Huge, classic disc shaped with dome, white lights sequentially moving around edge of disc

content.detailedDescription:
(573) 953-1900

i have had multiple sitings in different areas of the state. i listed my most regular i’ve been seeing this fairly consistently for the past year on my way too and from work. their are crop planes in the area and i used to live within a couple miles of the st louis airport and these are not it. airplanes don’t hover. i also have seen hovering helicopters working on lines next to the very high bridge i drive across. definitely not that. this highway is new and runs through a more rural style area with biking trails and flood plains. most of my sitings are low and very from being north or south of the bridge. hwy 367 crossing the river is the location. never any sound as far as i can tell but i’m usually sitting in traffic and watching. always metallic looking in nature. they generally hover for a few minutes and are in front of clouds but above trees. i’d say i see something like this around once a month and always during the day. i also put september as the siting because i think that’s when the best/longest one occurred. i have taken pictures before but crappy smartphone camera doesn’t capture its like trying to take a picture of the moon on a smartphone.
content.summary: I regularly see hovering crafts on my way home from work that disappear. sometimes on my way in as well. all daylight

content.detailedDescription:
(573) 953-1900

i have had multiple sitings in different areas of the state. i listed my most regular i’ve been seeing this fairly consistently for the past year on my way too and from work. their are crop planes in the area and i used to live within a couple miles of the st louis airport and these are not it. airplanes don’t hover. i also have seen hovering helicopters working on lines next to the very high bridge i drive across. definitely not that. this highway is new and runs through a more rural style area with biking trails and flood plains. most of my sitings are low and very from being north or south of the bridge. hwy 367 crossing the river is the location. never any sound as far as i can tell but i’m usually sitting in traffic and watching. always metallic looking in nature. they generally hover for a few minutes and are in front of clouds but above trees. i’d say i see something like this around once a month and always during the day. i also put september as the siting because i think that’s when the best/longest one occurred. i have taken pictures before but crappy smartphone camera doesn’t capture its like trying to take a picture of the moon on a smartphone.
content.summary: I regularly see hovering crafts on my way home from work that disappear. sometimes on my way in as well. all daylight

content.detailedDescription: Additional supporting witness to case 88664 in murphysboro, illinois. the jackson county sheriff department was contacted by the witness in case 88664, and a deputy responded to the witness' sighting of a formation of red and white lights, almost 20, moving across the sky. the witness stated that the deputy followed the objects in the sky.
content.summary: Additional supporting witness to case 88664 in murphysboro, illinois

content.detailedDescription: I went to see my friend and took a walk over a bridge i looked up and saw this ufo the size of a caravan with turcoize blue electric trails from the rear it moved like it was skimming on the atmosphere like a pebble skimming in a pond it moved so fast faster than anything i have ever seen it was gone in a blink but the felling i got was as if it was watching me as it ziped off
content.summary: It was the size of a carovan with turcoize blue electric trails  skimming like a stone on a pond

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for sunrise in order to see the hiking path to hickman natural bridge in capitol reef national park, i snapped two photos with my panasonic lumix camera, one looking east and one looking south. the one looking east had a bright star near the horizon over the rock formations and the one looking south had what i thought was the milky way. it wasn’t until i got home and looked through my photos that i thought another star was visible in the area of the milky way. but when i enlarge it, it looks more like an object with a flat bottom, a defined shape and what looks like reflections from the rising sun off the surface or lights. we didn’t hear any unusual sounds. unfortunately, i didn’t observe it at the time but only in the photo. i am sending both photos for comparison.
content.summary: Unidentifiable object in photo of night sky

content.detailedDescription: Some reason i woke up on my back (never sleep on back) quickly notice there was 4-5 tall white and glowing aliens at foot of my bed.It hurt my eyes to look at them cause so bright but didnt cast any light in the room closet completely dark.They had the biggest smiles and for some reason i wasnt afraid or confused at all felt happy.One of them pointed a weird device at my pregnant girl friend at the time.Feel like they took us somewhere cause like i said never wake up on back.Would be willing to take lie detector test or hypnosis. this really burns me up now cause when i talk about it everyone thinks im just crazy or dreaming but my gf saw too she was scared to talk about it for months. had to tell this to someone thatmight actualy consider im telling the truth.I think my girl commited suicide because of this.Just feels good to talk about this all i want is answers and i will never now.
content.summary: Tall angelic in my room pointed something at my pregnant gf large smiles

content.detailedDescription:
Ao fotografar os aviões da esquadrilha da fumaça (da força aérea brasileira), observei que havia ao fundo três objetos voadores não identificados juntamente à esquadrilha.
há menos de dois meses, na mesma direção, também já havia fotografado outro objeto voador não identificado ao observar um helicóptero preto sobrevoando minha casa.
content.summary: 3 black ufo with six aeroplanes

content.detailedDescription: Ao observar e fotografar um helicóptero preto sobrevoando próximo a minha residência, verifiquei que ao fundo da fotografia havia um objeto estranho.
content.summary: Black with wings

content.detailedDescription:
1 (661) 889-6660

not sure if it's a ufo event or not but due to the high strangeness and military response i felt it imperative to document it with mufon.  it was 5:09 am and me and my girlfriend were awake talking when a massive boom / explosion sound happened. we immediately opened up the nextdoor app on her phone and posted about it. it was so loud it rattled the house. people 7 miles away experienced the same thing in that instant. literally tens of thousands of people that were awake felt, heard, and saw this. it happened again at 5:21 am. the new had to say something because they were strong so many calls about it - at first they reported that it was the local bomb squad doing testing.  later that day they reported that the bomb squad tested between 8am - 10am so it wasn't that. since then not anything has been said. on 5/16/16 at 7:40 am a black long helicopter flew above our house and did a mike wide radius circle around and then went north of or location.  at 7:53 am a military tank, two military heavily armored vehicles (very very large ones) with the full armor over the windows rolled down the 24th street / 178 fwy headed east. still nothing else in the local media about any of this.
content.summary: Massive boom. no craft. military appears and near blackout in media. thousands of witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my semi northbound on i35 as i do monday through friday, and have been doing for the past 2.5 years. i spotted a very odd object making no noise with an unconventional appearing flight path. i am used to police helicopters taking radar from the sky, and i am well versed on military aircraft... this wasn't even close... it was waaaaaay too big, i mean, the bigger than almost anything i had ever seen airborne before. i shot a grainy video at night and sent it to kxxv channel 25 news and they never reported on it, i also called the mclennan county sherrifs department and they chuckled and never got any further than that, then it happened again, on december 13, at 8:08pm, same stretch of road, and this time my video was a lot better. i am taking video on a samsung galaxy note 8 but it is not picking up the lighting i am seeing of the underside of this craft. no wings, elliptical mass and no conventional shape of any particular sort, just something rigid and extremely large.
 in the recent video, i capture it floating/flying away over distant tree tops,  i climb into my truck and start driving north again as the object continued south/southeast. i see a light in the distance at a high rate of speed circle around in about a 4 or 5 mile radius, approach the interstate, turn abruptly about 300 to 400 feet off the ground and hover... no noise, no down draft and no markings.
content.summary: Spotted twice on interstae 35

content.detailedDescription: At the time of capturing the pictures of the sited ufo i was on a camping trip as sun country resort in whitney, texas. i was taking pictures of the campsite to share with my family later. i didn't realize i had seen anything until examining the photos later and saw something in two of the pictures that i hadn't notice while taking them. i also unknowingly captured the same object in another photo while again taking scenic pictures of lake whitney at the area state park. again i had no idea i had captured anything until later viewing the pictures and zooming in on what appeared to be something floating above the lake, is didn't look like a plan of any-kind, it also didn't look like any kind of drone that i had ever seen, nor did it look like any kind of balloon, and after seeing it in two different photos i was inspired to contact this organization to see what you might think of what i had photographed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flying object that hovered over head captured in scenic photos taken while on camping trip.

content.detailedDescription:
1. was hanging out washing at about 7pm at night at home. 
2. i noticed it because it was unusual and in my direct line of sight. 
3. i had no idea what the object was but it was so unusual because of its speed. by the time i had called my mother to come outside she only saw the very end of it before it disappeared. 
4. the object was orange, fast and covered a distance from west to east in only about 10 seconds before disappearing. the strange thing was that there was no noise and was moving horizontally possibly about 200 meters above the tree line opposite me above a hill. 
6. the object simply disappeared. the next day my dad rung the airforce and they advised there was no aircraft in the area that evening.
content.summary: Object appeared across the valley over former airstrip 180 degrees in about 10seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I started meditating, i had been hearing and reading how ufo's will sometimes show up. i'm an avid star gazed, i was also hoping to catch a few meteor coming through because we just went through the geminid. 
when i first saw it i though it was maybe a meteor, except it didn't make since because there was no color from it burning up. 
i was facing the orion belt which was between nw and w. i saw it put of the corner of my left eye and it was extremely dark colored,  and i could tell there was an object. 
it crossed me going from my left to right and the street lights lit up the side. i couldn't see the shape, it almost looked like a giant rock at first.  it appeared to not go very fast.  it was about the size of a suv floating past about 20 to 50 ft above most tall trees. 
at first i laughed cause you got to be kidding me  the steven greer thing actually worked, and i was scared as he'll cause i never thought it would work. i started shaking so bad i completely forgot about my phone and the camera. 
i ran inside after i could move again,  and ran to yell my women. 
she would not wake up so i gathered myself really quick and ran back outside.  a helicopter came from the direction the object went, it had it search light on, it was flying about the same altitude.  
after this, i started seeing two or three lights crossing the sky. i figure these were satellites,  but i've never seem that many at one time.
content.summary: It seemed like it rotated, it had a meteorite color, helicopter came from the opposite direction 5 min later.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the craft again. i looked closely to see if it was a star or planet, however, i saw a row of white lights in a horizontal fashion which turned sideways at an angle just before 6:49 am. it later went backwards at 6:49 am. and looked smaller. 
 it was non appearant at 6:49. i know it will be back again.
content.summary: Unidentified flying object in the east to southeast morning sky.
